environmentalSimulator
Class VerticalProfile

java.lang.Object
  environmentalSimulator.VerticalProfile
All Implemented Interfaces:
MeteorologicalPhenomenon
public class VerticalProfile
extends java.lang.Object
implements MeteorologicalPhenomenon

This class represents the vertical profile as a meteorological phenomenon. A vertical profile is composed of a set of levels.

Field Summary
static double DEFAULT_MAXIMUM_HEIGHT
          The maximum height default value chosen to be implemented when the vertical profile is created, in meters.
